evidence.text:
Person A: It's not funny, man. Don't laugh. If it's true, Toros and I are fucked. Well, I'm not as fucked as Toros but still.
Person A: Probably. But look... if things get crazy, don't get rough with Ivan. Actually, don't even touch Ivan. Let me deal with him.
Person A: In case his boys are here... and they want to play games.

Person A: Help me. She's crazy.
Person A: She's crazy. Come and help me please!

Person A: You want me to keep her from going or what?
Person A: She's out of fucking control. Look!
Person B: Yes, hurry man, that cord.
